message: how can i implement Share button and NEWS FEED, user activity in Pinax, just like Facebook?
@rehmetjan I believe there is still a microblogging app in the Pinax social-project, but it doesn't have those features. coathangr.com shows how they extended that to build a nice site.
@rehmetjan Shouldn't be too hard to add that sort of thing though.
@pydanny thanks pydanny, it's really good demo
@rehmetjan  what demo? could you plz post it here
The "user activity" feed rather than a share button.
@micrypt do they build they own share button or is it a usuable app?
I think he meant that it's based on the Pinax microblogging app.
is there any share button app? or shall I write my own!! ?

@apoo hi apoo. i meant http://coathangr.com/ but they used micro-blogging features of Pinax, if you want to have Facebook like "SHARE" button, i think it's only write one. i am looking for this, if you done. please mention me :) thanks
@rehmetjan Hey, I ve been working on other stuff this week but I am hopping to get the "Share" button working by end of this week. I will let u know ;-)
@apoo nice, it'll be the first Django-based "Share" button, keep it up :)
@rehmetjan well other ppl have developed it but its not open sourced
